mapper.select: select if( enum = 1, case sex when '男' then 'man' end, if(enum = 2, case sex when '男' then 'man' else 'woman' end,'')) as sex2, boys.name as name from boys

select boys.name, if( enum = 1, case sex when '男' then 'man' end, if(enum = 2, case sex when '男' then 'man' else 'woman' end, '')) as sex2, created_time as createdTime, date_format(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as createdTimeStr, if( DATEDIFF(created_time, '1900-01-01') > 0 and DATEDIFF(created_time, '2021-05-22') <= 0, '现代人', case when DATEDIFF(created_time, '2021-05-22') > 0 then '未来人' when DATEDIFF(created_time, '1900-01-01') < 0 then '古代人' else '未知' end) as chaodai from boys
